CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Glimpse Group Inc is a diversified Virtual and Augmented Reality platform company, comprised of multiple VR and AR software and services companies, and designed with the specific purpose of cultivating companies in the emerging VR/AR industry.
